resources.string: Remove ads completely all over the app and get a smooth experience
Get access to upcoming exciting features added with continued updates
By getting the full version you can help me continue developing the app
Step 1 : Open the app and click on the \'+\' button
Step 2 : Now add text and set all the attributes you want, like text colour, font, etc. And click on the tick button to save
Step 3 : After saving, your widget will be added to the main page and is ready to be used on your home screen
Step 1 : Long press on your home screen to get a popup menu, and click on the widgets option
Step 2 : Now long press on the \'widget\' placeholder and then drag it to anywhere on your home screen

Step 3 : After that, you will be prompted to select any of your saved widgets. Then, click on any of them and it will automatically get placed on your home screen. From there, you can resize it in anyway you want

Open the app and long press on any of your saved widgets to open the widgets options sheet. Then click on \'Save widget as file\' option and the widget will be saved to your device as a file. (Storage permission required!)

Step 1 : Open the app and click on the 3 dot button on the top right corner to open a popup menu. Then click on the \'Import widget\' option to select a file. Navigate to the path where your \'.atw\' file is located and select it
Step 2 : After selecting, you will be prompted with a sheet showing the selected widget file, then click on the \'Add widget\' button and the widget will be added to your saved widgets
